entry.title: Daily Note 2025-11-14
entry.content:
So, Pine Labs got listed today. I watched it live. Nifty closed at 25,910. I have been checking it since it has been 21000. I am clearly a novice in the markets and I have to learn a lot. I have to learn because in order to generate ideas you need to pattern match and that comes from learning a lot of things.

I have watched a couple of Alix Pasquet’s videos and they are phenomenal. It’s a game of reps, reps and reps.

entry.title: presenting ekagrit ventures
entry.content:
Presenting ekagrit ventures, a platform where I get to ramble about finance and startups. This first post starts with my entry into the capital markets. I have put some money here and there before. Nothing significant as such.

This time, I have gone into the markets by applying for IPOs. I think it is a significant moment for any investor to apply to their first IPO. I applied for Groww and Pine Labs . Groww has given 22.9% gain in 2 days. Alas, I didn’t get the allotment. However, there is such a thing as beginner’s luck in the market, and to my surprise. I have been allotted a lot of Pine Labs. It opens tomorrow, and ekagrit ventures opens now.

Welcome aboard, ladies and gentlemen!
